annotations.title: Barfly Workshop #3

textContent:
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. honey syrup
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. ginger syrup
.75 oz. -or- 22 ml. lime juice
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. blanco tequila
Float of smokey mezcal

Shake & Strain into rocks glass over ice cubes
Float a smokey mezcal over the top
Garnish with Candy Ginger

title: Medicina Latina
